item.title: How About That Weather!? - An EDA of Climate Change in Berlin.
item.description: Introduction Data Import and Preparation Importing Tidying Visualizing Climate Change in Berlin Average Annual Temperature: Berlin Average Annual Temperature: Global vs. Local An Overview of Selected Variables Proportion of +25°C Days Sunshine Precipitation Days Without Precipitation Air Pressure Conclusion Introduction In his book What We Think About When We Try Not to Think About Global Warming, Per Espen Stoknes writes the following about the role of psychological “distance” when faced with climate change:
